name: metamask-hello-world
description: Hello world example for etherium blockchain interaction.

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o build/metamask-hello-world.js
scripts.dev: mkdir -p build/ && npm run build && node ./scripts/budo
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist/ && npm run browserify -s -- --debug | exorcist dist/metamask-hello-world.js.map > dist/metamask-hello-world.js && uglifyjs dist/metamask-hello-world.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/metamask-hello-world.min.js
scripts.integration-test: truffle compile && truffle migrate && truffle test

author: William Robertson
